item.title: Prayer bpn10984 in Tuvalu
item.description: *(Te talo tenei, ne fakaasi mai ne ‘Abdu’l-Bahá, e faitau i Tena Tanumate. E mafai foki o fai ia koe loa ia koe.) So se tino e faitau ne ia a te talo tenei mo maulalo Whoso reciteth this prayer with lowliness and fervor will bring gladness and joy to the heart of this Servant; it will be even as meeting Him face to face. A Ia ko te Silisiliese-Katoatoa! O te Atua, toku Atua!
